channel.title: Pk point help
channel.description:
I'm brand new to Project Insanity (And i'm actually starting to learn to code rather than leech :D), and my Pk Point shop doesn't charge anything for the items in it. This is what comes up.
[IMG]http://i865.photobucket.com/albums/ab219/vmanlyman/untitledtwo.jpg[/img]
Everything is 0 pk points. I want to make it so they're all 500.

item.title: Pk point help
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Epicmaul, post:5, topic:393339”]Shopassistant.java
Search for:[quote] public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { [/quote]
Under[quote] public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
switch (id) {[/quote]
Add

		case ITEMID:
		return ITEMVALUEINSHOP[EX.500;

Now you should have added something like this

		case 15027:
		return 125;[/quote]

Thank you so much. And yellow really is bad to use with white background. lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk point help
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“Epicmaul, post:5, topic:393339”]Shopassistant.java
Search for:[quote] public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { [/quote]
Under[quote] public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
switch (id) {[/quote]
Add

		case ITEMID:
		return ITEMVALUEINSHOP[EX.500;

Now you should have added something like this

		case 15027:
		return 125;[/quote]

Definitly one really good way to do it.

@offtopic. Really… Yellow… lol i had to highlight it to be able to read it

Read full topic

item.title: Pk point help
item.dc:creator: @Epicmaul Epicmaul
item.description:
@Epicmaul wrote:

Shopassistant.java
Search for:

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

Under
public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
switch (id) {

Add 
		case ITEMID:
		return ITEMVALUEINSHOP[EX.500;

Now you should have added something like this

		case 15027:
		return 125;

Read full topic

item.title: Pk point help
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:3, topic:393339”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=490507.msg3586735#msg3586735 date=1304236094]
i can help, message me your msn and ill help via teamviewer.
[/quote]

I don’t have msn and don’t want to give out my teamviewer. Just post how. It’s so much easier.[/quote]

I laughed so hard at this. No.

Read full topic
